message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $950000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $800000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $800000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850000. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $850000 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable paying $900000. I'm willing to go up to $890000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
